content:
MainForm MainForm Class

In this Article

Edit

Provides the following functionalities:

  • CRUD operations for devices
  • Receiving Events from a device
  • Sending Messages to a device

Syntax

Declaration

public class MainForm : Form, IDropTarget, ISynchronizeInvoke, IWin32Window, IBindableComponent, IArrangedElement, IComponent, IDisposable, IContainerControlPublic Class MainForm

    Implements IDropTarget, ISynchronizeInvoke, IWin32Window, IBindableComponent, IArrangedElement, IComponent, IDisposable, IContainerControl
